    <section class="notification-banner O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV">
        <div class="A-PNLINLNEMSGE-RW-ALL">
            <div class="notification-banner-icon">
                <i class="icon icon-circle-info" aria-hidden="true"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="notification-banner-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL">
                <p>Remember to stay alert and watch out for phishing SMSes, emails, and fraudulent websites. We will never send any SMS or email with a link requesting you to log on to HSBC Online Banking.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>We have further strengthened our security measures to protect our customers. After activating your Mobile Security Key, you may need to further <a href="#verify-your-identity">verify your identity</a> before you can enjoy full access to HSBC Online and Mobile Banking services.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>You may be required to <a href="#verify-your-identity">verify your identity</a> if we detect any suspicious activity on your HSBC HK App, HSBC Online Banking, HSBC Reward+ and HSBC Easy Invest. You'll see a page/ message about it on the HSBC HK App. We'll also notify you via SMS and email.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>Switching to a new phone? Set up the HSBC HK App on it in just a few steps. Don't forget to verify your identity to enjoy our full range of services. <a href="/ways-to-bank/internet/security-key/#content_main_heading_5" target="_self">See how to set it up</a>.</p>
<p> </p>
<p>You can now easily register for Personal Internet Banking and set up the HSBC HK App with your eligible HKID / passport and a selfie. <a href="#accordion-log-on-with-security-code-on-trusted-browser-i-am-new-to-digital">Learn more</a>.</p>

                
            </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can register for HSBC HK App, HSBC HK Easy Invest, and HSBC Reward+ all at once simply with your HKID / passport and a selfie.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Tips:</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><strong>Get your adult HKID / passport ready (same as your bank record)</strong><br> - <strong>New Smart HKID (2018 version)</strong><br> - <strong>Supported passports</strong>: Australia, Belgium, Canada, India, Ireland, Italy, Jersey, Mexico, Philippines, Singapore, South Africa, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam and Taiwan<br> <br> Not holding an eligible HKID or passport? <a href="#register-with-your-account-details">Find out how to register with your account details</a>.<br></li>
 <li><strong>Start your registration in a private place with good lighting</strong></li>
</ul>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Step 7: Then, we'll ask you to set up the following:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><strong>Username</strong>: It is a unique identification for you to log on to the HSBC HK App or HSBC Online Banking.</li>
 <li><strong>Password</strong>: You will need to use it to set up the HSBC HK App or log on to HSBC Online Banking.</li>
 <li><strong>Security question and answer</strong>: You have to set up a security question and answer which can help you reset your password in the future. Please select a question and answer you can remember.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Step 8: Finally, we'll ask you to create a 6-digit <strong>Mobile Banking PIN</strong> and you may also enable biometric authentication on supported devices for faster and more seamless access.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Tips:</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll complete your identity verification swiftly and you may log on to the HSBC HK App right away. </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We may need more time to verify your identity in edge cases, but we'll notify you of the result within 24 hours via SMS and email. Upon successful identity verification, you can relaunch the app to log on.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You just need to download and set up the HSBC HK App simply with your HKID / passport and a selfie*.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Tips:</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><strong>Get your adult HKID / passport ready (same as your bank record)</strong><br> - <strong>New Smart HKID (2018 version)</strong><br> - <strong>Supported passports</strong>: Australia, Belgium, Canada, India, Ireland, Italy, Jersey, Mexico, Philippines, Singapore, South Africa, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam and Taiwan<br> <br> Not holding an eligible HKID or passport? <a href="#credentials">Find out how to set up the HSBC HK App with your online banking credentials</a>.</li>
 <li><strong>Start setting up the HSBC HK App in a private place with good lighting</strong></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">*After setting up the HSBC HK App, your Physical Security Device will be disabled to protect your account.</p>
</div></div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Step 6: Finally, we'll ask you to create a 6-digit <strong>Mobile Banking PIN</strong> and you may also enable biometric authentication on supported devices for faster and more seamless access.</p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We'll complete your identify verification swiftly and you may log on to the HSBC HK App right away. </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In edge cases, we may need more time to verify your identity but we'll notify you of the result within 24 hours via SMS and email. Upon successful identity verification, you can relaunch the app to log on.</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    <div class="anchor" id="verify-your-identity"></div>
    


<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_7">
    Verifying your identity​
</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_32" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To better protect the security of your accounts, you may be asked to verify your identity when required (such as after having activated the Mobile Security Key) to enjoy full access to HSBC Digital Banking services.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_73" class="cc-column">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_38">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_74" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_3" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-152672557__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-152672557__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Verify your identity </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-152672557__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_39">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_75" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_33" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To strengthen security measures for protecting our customers, after you've activated the Mobile Security Key via the HSBC HK App on a new device (including removing and reinstalling the HSBC HK App on your existing device), you may need to further verify your identity before you can enjoy full access to HSBC Online and Mobile Banking services.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The following services on HSBC Online and Mobile Banking may be affected if you do not verify your identity:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>Transfers to non-registered third-party accounts</li>
 <li>Bill payments to certain merchants</li>
 <li>Adding new payees for local transfers and HSBC Global Transfers</li>
 <li>Changing transfer limits (including small value and non-registered account transfer limits)</li>
 <li>Viewing your debit card CVV</li>
 <li>Changing personal information</li>
 <li>Mobile cash withdrawal</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The above verification requirement doesn't apply to customers who are setting up the Mobile Banking PIN on an existing device with the Mobile Security Key already activated on the HSBC HK App.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can verify your identity using any of these methods:</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>HSBC HK App</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After you've activated your Mobile Security Key via the HSBC HK App on a new device for 24 hours, you may be prompted to verify your identity using a one-time password (OTP) sent to you via SMS when you log on to the HSBC HK App. Alternatively, you can also go to the 'Profile' tab on the HSBC HK App to verify your identity (HSBC HK App >  'Profile'  > 'Security' > 'Verify identity').</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>HSBC/ Hang Seng ATM</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After you've activated your Mobile Security Key via the HSBC HK App, you may use any HSBC/ Hang Seng ATM (excluding Foreign Currency ATMs and Express ATMs) in Hong Kong to verify your identity (ATM > ’Other services‘ > ‘Verify identity after Mobile Security Key activation').</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you may also call our enquiry hotline for assistance:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: (852) 2233 3033</li>
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: (852) 2233 3033</li>
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: (852) 2233 3322</li>
 <li>Other customers: (852) 2233 3000</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may be required to verify your identity if we detect any suspicious activities on your HSBC HK App, HSBC Online Banking, HSBC Reward+ and HSBC Easy Invest. You'll see a page/ message about it on the HSBC HK App. We'll also notify you via SMS and email.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may follow the instructions seen on the page / message on the HSBC HK App or in our communications to verify your identity to restore full access to our digital banking services. <a href="/mobile/faq/#verify-your-identity">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_8">
    Manage / switch device
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_34" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When you log on to the HSBC HK App for the first time or are using a new device, you'll be asked to create a 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN for the device. For security reasons, you can only set up the HSBC HK App on one device. You may remove linked devices on the HSBC HK App or Online Banking to free up space for your new device.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note, after setting up the HSBC HK App, you may need to further <a href="#verify-your-identity">verify your identity</a> before you can enjoy full access to HSBC Online and Mobile Banking services.</p>
</div></div>

<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_10">
    Generate security code from the HSBC HK App
</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_62" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After you've set up the HSBC HK App, you may use the Mobile Security Key feature at the bottom of the log-on screen right away to generate a security code to log on to HSBC Online Banking, verify your online transaction or re-authenticate.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We have enhanced our security measures on HSBC Online Banking to protect your account from unauthorised access. You must create a Personal Internet Banking password before you can continue using HSBC Online Banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Also, if you are using an untrusted browser, you will receive a notification and be asked to confirm whether to trust the browser on this device. Trusting your browser means we will know it is you logging on, and you can do so seamlessly without additional verification in the future, but you should do this only if you are using a personal computer.</p>
